QueryResult.text: SELECT cdfo_ancestor.assoc_obj_id id, cdfh.child_id, cdfo_ancestor.assoc_obj_type, ii.id inv_id, ii.ODF_OBJECT_CODE inv_type, ii.code inv_code ,ii.name inv_name, ii.description inv_desc FROM CLB_DMS_FOLDERS cdfo_ancestor , CLB_DMS_FLAT_HIERARCHY cdfh , INV_INVESTMENTS ii WHERE cdfo_ancestor.id = cdfh.ancestor_id AND cdfo_ancestor.folder_type = 'ProjectFolder' AND cdfo_ancestor.assoc_obj_type = 'Projects' AND ii.odf_object_code = 'project' AND ii.id = cdfo_ancestor.assoc_obj_id
